name: Dino's Will
description:
Description :
You want to reach the top platform, easy stuff right?

Of course not, Dino will never make it so easy for you to control him. 😈

Gameplay : 
Try to reach the top most platform while avoiding the falling rocks, Dino will never make it easy for you to control him, so it'll be a little tougher to get there. 😄

Controls : 

Use A and D to Move ( You can use the arrow keys instead)

Use Space to jump
